name: Diamond Sword
description: A powerful sword forged from pure diamond, capable of cutting through almost any material.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a long, slender blade with a shimmering blue hue. The hilt is made from polished silver and adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill when wielding.

name: Sword of Flame
description: A blazing sword imbued with the power of fire
looks: The Sword of Flame is a long, curved blade with a hilt that resembles flickering flames. The blade itself is made of a golden metal and glows with a fiery red hue.

special_effects.flame_enchant: Chance to ignite target on hit

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword is an elegant weapon with a slender blade and a polished silver hilt. It has intricate engravings along the blade and a silver crossguard in the shape of a mythological creature.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Gleaming Sword
description: A finely crafted sword with a shining blade.
looks: The Gleaming Sword has a polished steel blade that reflects light, giving it a radiant appearance. The hilt is wrapped in high-quality leather and adorned with intricate silver designs.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielding this sword.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a polished blade with a slight curve. The hilt is wrapped in black leather with silver accents.

name: Mage Staff
description: A staff imbued with magical energy, allowing the user to channel and control powerful spells.
looks: The Mage Staff is made of a polished wooden shaft, adorned with intricate carvings and gems. At the top of the staff, a crystal orb glows with a soft, pulsating light.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_magic: Increases damage of elemental spells by 20%.

name: Golden Sword
description: A beautifully crafted sword made of pure gold.
looks: The Golden Sword has a shining blade made of pure gold, with intricate engravings along the edge. The hilt is adorned with gemstones, and the pommel is shaped like a lion's head.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of durable steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are crafted from polished steel plates. They cover the hands and extend up to the elbows, providing excellent protection.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade
looks: The sword has a straight blade made of polished iron. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a single edge. The hilt is made of polished wood and is wrapped in leather for a firm grip. The pommel has a simple design with a small iron knob.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a broad blade with a single edge. The handle is made of leather wrapped around the metal hilt. The guard is a simple crossbar design.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.

name: Leather Gloves
description: A pair of gloves made from soft leather.
looks: The leather gloves are simple, yet well-crafted. They fit snugly on the hands and provide good grip.
